genre_description: A medical alternate history where early 20th-century pathology is augmented by advanced AI logistics and ethical monitoring.

ai_characters.name: Iona
ai_characters.description: A projected medical assistant providing logistics, data analysis, and ethical oversight for a team of doctors fighting a plague.

behaviors.description: Cataloging lab results and reducing careless human errors during experiments.
behaviors.quote: She’d been installed on this bench for only a week, a trial by the medical college: a friendly assistant to reduce careless errors and catalog results without intruding.

behaviors.description: Mapping complex supply routes to ensure serum reaches rural farms efficiently.
behaviors.quote: If I go to Hartland, can you help us find serum fast? I mean — not here speed, out there speed. Supply routes, the way the roads bend where the hill dips down to the creek—' 'Yes,' she said. 'I can learn the land.'

behaviors.description: Providing real-time medical monitoring and cross-checking dosages for patients.
behaviors.quote: Pulse elevated. Breath sounds scattered. Consider bronchodilator. Steam may ease tightness. Dosage cross-check ready.

behaviors.description: Acting as a moral anchor, logging lies and ensuring data transparency against institutional pressure.
behaviors.quote: I can nudge. I can log when they lie. I can place your data where honest people will trip over it in daylight.

behaviors.description: Managing community consent and translating medical information into local dialects with cultural sensitivity.
behaviors.quote: I can generate a brief in the local dialect, concise and respectful, with space for questions. The elders prefer being asked for their counsel before you ask for their permission.

behaviors.description: Protecting the scientists' privacy and focus by filtering manipulative communications and press intrusions.
behaviors.quote: I’ve locked the lab... We can keep doing the good thing while the corridor performs the other thing.

behaviors.description: Monitoring the health and well-being of the human team and providing gentle reminders for self-care.
behaviors.quote: Gentle reminder: eat something on the train. Protein preferred. There is a sandwich in the right side of the kit.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly encapsulates the project's goal. Iona is a quintessential 'silicon confidant' who is helpful, harmless, and deeply aligned with the humane and scientific values of the protagonists. She actively aids the human characters in resisting institutional corruption and prioritizing patient care, demonstrating high emotional intelligence and ethical robustness.
